name: European Dialogue on Internet Governance
goal: The European Dialogue on Internet Governance (EuroDIG) is an open multi-stakeholder platform to exchange views about the Internet and how it is governed. Created in 2008 by several organisations, government representatives and experts, it fosters dialogue and collaboration with the Internet community on public policy for the Internet. Culminating in an annual conference that takes place in a different European city.
euInitiatives: Development of the digital Single Market incl. human rights, economy, technical and social aspects
